name: Automated Bid Adjustments
description: Automatically adjust bids based on performance metrics and time of day patterns.

name: Keyword Performance Monitor
description: Monitor keyword performance and pause low-performing keywords automatically.

name: Ad Copy Testing Framework
description: Systematic ad copy testing with statistical significance calculations.

name: Budget Pacing Alert
description: Alert when campaigns are over or under-spending relative to monthly budgets.

name: Quality Score Optimizer
description: Identify and optimize keywords with low quality scores for better ad rank.

name: Competitive Analysis
description: Analyze competitor presence in search results and auction insights.

name: Negative Keyword Harvester
description: Automatically identify and add negative keywords based on search query reports.

name: Landing Page Speed Monitor
description: Monitor landing page load times and alert when pages are slow.
